name: Conveyor Belt Simulator 2023
description:
This is a complicated and difficult game but I'm too tired right now to write a tutorial.  Best of luck to you.....

...

..

.

Okay fine, here's some advice:

more production needs more packaging

more friction = less distance error

more speed = less time error but more distance error and shorter buffer

more max speed = can catch up better but more error

waiting = lug stops less frequently but less buffer for incoming bread

hire j.k. simmons if your production line is rushing or dragging, fire him if its overcorrecting

more, longer smart belts = more buffer for incoming bread

longer accumulator and lug buffer = more buffer for outgoing bread but need more buffer for incoming bread

lug speed is tied to production speed, changing one changes the other

you gain points towards promotion for packaging bread and maintaining a streak, lose points over time as well as for unpackaged bread 

the accumulator has the same AI as the smart belts. It just has a different name

Don't buy stocks
